desc.en: With Eimi's guidance, Sensei meets Himari and sets off with the Super Phenomenon Task Force to help in their search for the unprecedented AI, Decagrammaton.
desc.jp: With Eimi's guidance, Sensei meets Himari and sets off with the Super Phenomenon Task Force to help in their search for the unprecedented AI, Decagrammaton.
desc.zh_cn: 在{cf英美}的介绍之下，[USERNAME]老师认识了{cf阳葵}，并且决定与{cn特异现象搜查部}同行，一同出发去寻找新世代AI机器人十字神名。

desc.en: Himari tries to interpret Decagrammaton's structure based on the collected data, but Decagrammaton appears and launches an attack. However, Decagrammaton suddenly panics and backs hastily away when faced with the Shittim Chest.
desc.jp: Himari tries to interpret Decagrammaton's structure based on the collected data, but Decagrammaton appears and launches an attack. However, Decagrammaton suddenly panics and backs hastily away when faced with the Shittim Chest.
desc.zh_cn: {cf阳葵}打算利用先前收集到的数据分析十字神名的构造，没想到十字神名却在此时现身攻击众人。{et希迪姆的箱子}的出现似乎另十字神名相当惊慌，而战斗也在十字神名的匆忙撤退下暂时落幕。

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.jp: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.en: Eimi and Himari escape Decagrammaton and set up a club room for the Super Phenomenon Task Force. Before starting a new operation, Himari explains what the prophets of Decagrammaton and the Tree of Life are to Sensei before heading to the excavation site of Abydos to find new evidence.
desc.jp: Eimi and Himari escape Decagrammaton and set up a club room for the Super Phenomenon Task Force. Before starting a new operation, Himari explains what the prophets of Decagrammaton and the Tree of Life are to Sensei before heading to the excavation site of Abydos to find new evidence.
desc.zh_cn: {cf英美}和{cf阳葵}避开十字神名，在新的地方设立{cn特异现象搜查部}的部室。{cf阳葵}在开始新作战前向老师说明「十字神名的预言者」和「生命之树」，并前往{sn阿拜多斯}的挖掘地寻找新证据。

为了一探秘密，快和「{cn特异现象搜查部}」一起展开调查吧！

desc.en: What is the Absolute Being Autonomous Analysis System: Decagrammaton? Pursue Decagrammaton's secrets with the Super Phenomenon Task Force!
desc.jp: What is the Absolute Being Autonomous Analysis System: Decagrammaton? Pursue Decagrammaton's secrets with the Super Phenomenon Task Force!

为了一探秘密，快和「{cn特异现象搜查部}」一起展开调查吧！

desc.en: Eimi and Sensei engage in battle against Kether under Himari's instructions.
desc.jp: Eimi and Sensei engage in battle against Kether under Himari's instructions.
desc.zh_cn: {cf英美}和老师依照{cf阳葵}的指示和「凯瑟」展开了战斗。

desc.en: Eimi and Sensei successfully neutralize Kether and make their way to the Research District after the battle. While inspecting the site, Himari senses something is amiss and decides to take part in the field investigation.
desc.jp: Eimi and Sensei successfully neutralize Kether and make their way to the Research District after the battle. While inspecting the site, Himari senses something is amiss and decides to take part in the field investigation.
desc.zh_cn: 战斗结束后，{cf英美}和老师成功让「凯瑟」失效，并且潜入了「研究地区」。{cf阳葵}在观察现场后觉得很可疑，于是便参加了搜索现场的任务。

desc.en: Eimi and Sensei launch an investigation of the area where Decagrammaton's signal was captured. Contrary to Himari's prediction, it fails to yield any results. But after a moment of contemplation, Sensei notices the presence of a highly conspicuous vending machine and they are met with Decagrammaton's main form.
desc.jp: Eimi and Sensei launch an investigation of the area where Decagrammaton's signal was captured. Contrary to Himari's prediction, it fails to yield any results. But after a moment of contemplation, Sensei notices the presence of a highly conspicuous vending machine and they are met with Decagrammaton's main form.
desc.zh_cn: {cf英美}和老师调查了捕捉到十字神名信号的地方。探索后没有获得任何成果，和{cf阳葵}预料中的完全不一样。但经过调查后，老师留意到了充满违和感的贩卖机，并从中发现了十字神名的本体。

desc.en: Himari is distraught to learn that Decagrammaton's main form is a lowly commercial AI. As the unsolved mystery leads only to more and more questions, the Super Phenomenon Task Force's mission at hand begins anew.
desc.jp: Himari is distraught to learn that Decagrammaton's main form is a lowly commercial AI. As the unsolved mystery leads only to more and more questions, the Super Phenomenon Task Force's mission at hand begins anew.
desc.zh_cn: 得知十字神名的本体是贩卖机AI后，{cf阳葵}感到相当茫然。在尚未解开的谜题中，疑问不断地堆栈，特异现象搜查部再次展开任务。
